objects.text:
• Digital LED Display & Intuitive Controls
• Large Capacity Front-Loading Design
• Energy-Efficient Heat Pump Technology
• Multiple Cycles for All Fabric Types

product_details.name: Insignia Premium Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Made Easy
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with intuitive controls for easy operation
• Sleek white design with modern black accents
• Large capacity front-loading washer for efficient cleaning
• Energy-efficient heat pump dryer technology
• Multiple wash and dry cycles for versatile fabric care
• Smart sensors for optimal water and energy usage
• Quiet operation with advanced noise reduction
• Matching set design for a cohesive laundry room look
• Space-saving stackable design option
• Easy-access large door opening for convenient loading
• Digital temperature and time controls for precise settings
• Energy Star certified for lower utility bills

banner_details:
This banner showcases a promotional layout for a premium laundry set, featuring a modern and clean aesthetic. The left side of the composition is filled with a deep diagonal gradient background transitioning through rich navy tones, while the right side is a light, soft gray gradient. The central top-left contains a bold multi-line heading (`heading`), followed by an energetic subheading (`subheading`) in bright blue. A detailed feature list (`description`) appears beneath, styled as bullet points. Lower text layers highlight urgency (`tagline`) and price (`price`). A clear call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with a bold label (`cta`) is anchored near the bottom. The product image (`product_image`) balances the layout on the bottom right. Overall, the layout merges clarity, contrast, and visual hierarchy effectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #0A2647
- Steel Blue: #144272
- Sky Blue: #2CC9FF
- Warm Yellow: #FFC700
- Light Gray: #F5F5F5
product_color: The product image features sleek, modern Insignia washer and dryer units with a clean, minimalist design. The dominant color is crisp white (#FFFFFF), representing cleanliness and modernity, used across the appliance bodies. Contrasting this, black (#000000) and dark charcoal gray (#333333) are used for the control panels and door windows, offering sharp definition and depth. Cool blue (#3399FF) is subtly used in the LED display to highlight settings and convey a digital, tech-forward aesthetic. Metallic silver/gray (#C0C0C0) accents on the knobs add sophistication. Together, these colors blend seamlessly, creating an elegant, high-tech feel, ideal for a professional product advertisement banner.
